tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE visa_passport_info (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    country_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    visa_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    visa_expiry_date DATE,
    passport_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    passport_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE visa_info (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    country_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    passport_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    visa_type VARCHAR(50),
    visa_start_date DATE,
    visa_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE visa_information (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    country_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    passport_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    visa_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    entry_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE country_details (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    country_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    capital_city VARCHAR(255),
    official_language VARCHAR(255),
    currency VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE visa_tracking (
    tracking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    visa_id INT NOT NULL,
    application_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    decision_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE traveler_information (
    traveler_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    nationality VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    email_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE visa_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    visa_id UUID,
    traveler_id UUID,
    entry_date DATE,
    exit_date DATE
);
